phase_title_etxt: Register and get your pilot certificates.
phase_title_ftxt: Register and get your pilot certificates. (fr)
phase_description_etxt: In this phase you will learn what you need before you fly your drone.
phase_description_ftxt: In this phase you will learn what you need before you fly your drone. (fr)

phase_description_etxt: In this phase, you will learn things you should know about your drone for safety.
phase_description_ftxt: Dans cette phase, vous apprendrez des choses que vous devriez savoir sur votre drone pour des raisons de sécurité.
